00017 class API Intensity {
00018   public:
00019     //  *Time array of the wake in [s]*
00020     f_vector_t fTimeArray;
00021     //  *Frequency array of the impedance in [Hz]*
00022     f_vector_t fFreqArray;
00023     //  *Wake array in* [:math:`\Omega / s`]
00024     f_vector_t fWake;
00025     //  *Impedance array in* [:math:`\Omega`]
00026     complex_vector_t fImpedance;
00027 
00028     Intensity(){};
00029     virtual void wake_calc(const f_vector_t& NewTimeArray) = 0;
00030     virtual void imped_calc(const f_vector_t& NewFrequencyArray) = 0;
00031     virtual ~Intensity(){};
00032 };
